long_description: Serfas Pro-Flo grips provide an aggressive, ergonomic hold and easy, lock-on installation. Gel palm pads eliminates pressure on wrists and forearms. Ulnar horn reduces pressure on arteries of the hands. Dual-density design features a hard inner shell and soft outer casing. Lock-on clamp design make installation quick and simple and holds grips tight to bars.
short_description: Serfas Pro-Flo grips provide an aggressive, ergonomic hold and easy, lock-on installation.
